name: Tiny Tank - Battle City on the table
name_original: Tiny Tank - Battle City on the table
description:
Free 3D tank game here, simple and funny!
Toy war game mania with game center!
Super exciting!
Super fun!

Table, bad, where is the enemy where is the battlefield!
Just come and fight!

----- Highlighted Features -----
Easy to learn, everyone can play!
operate a tank and destroy all the enemy!
Table, Desk, bad, Flying chess, battlefield tough but funny!
Over 20 battlefield and 80+ well-designed level!
Cromwell,Hetzer,KV1,M4,M24,Panther-G,T34,Tiger...
You can find all the famous tank here!
Shot bomb, Tracking bomb, Laser projectile，Special bullet made fight more madness!
Fight for peace in this crazy summer!

----- How to Play -----
Tank is Auto shooting mode, just need operation tank to move.
4 kinds and over 10 shapes can be choose.
Upgrade attribute, skill and star quality make tank more powerful.
Tiny Tank is completely free to play but some in-game items may require payment.
